description: Canvas domain allows tracking of 2D and WebGL canvases that have an associated graphics context. Tracks canvases belonging to a frame as well as CSS canvases created with -webkit-canvas.

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: Uniquely identifies shader program within parent canvas.

types.description: The type of rendering context backing the canvas element.
Shader type. WebGL 1.0 supports VERTEX_SHADER and FRAGMENT_SHADER types.
Information about a 2D/WebGL canvas for which a rendering context has been created.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The CSS canvas identifier, or the canvas element id attribute.

properties.name: contextType
properties.description: The type of rendering context backing the canvas.

properties.name: contextAttributes
properties.description: Context attributes for WebGL rendering contexts.

properties.name: programIds
properties.description: Array of program IDs for linked programs belonging to the canvas rendering context.

commands.name: getCanvases
commands.description: Returns available canvases for all frames.

parameters.name: canvasId
parameters.description: Id of the canvas that was removed.

events.name: programCreated
events.description: Fired when a program is created. Does not imply that link was successful.
